mapper.select: SELECT /* DeviceMapper.getAllDevice, 이전 휴대기기 단건 조회, 황정택/와이즈스톤, 2013-12-05 */ tenant_id , insd_usermbr_no , insd_device_id , device_id , device_model_cd , mno_cd , device_alias , rep_device_yn , TO_CHAR( auth_dt,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS auth_dt , TO_CHAR( upd_dt,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , sms_recv_yn , device_natv_id , device_acct , svc_mang_no , entry_chnl_cd , auth_yn FROM tb_us_usermbr_device WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantID} AND insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND insd_device_id = #{deviceKey}

SELECT /* DeviceMapper.searchAllDevice, 이전 휴대기기 개별 조회, 황정택/와이즈스톤, 2013-12-05 */ #{userKey} AS userKey , ( SELECT mbr_id FROM tb_us_usermbr WHERE insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND tenant_id = #{commonRequest.tenantID} ) AS userID , #{commonRequest.tenantID} AS tenantID , #{deviceKey} AS deviceKey FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE /* DeviceMapper.removeDevice, 휴대기기 삭제, 황정택/와이즈스톤, 2013-12-20 */ tb_us_usermbr_device SET auth_yn = #{isUsed}, rep_device_yn = 'N', start_dt = SYSDATE, end_dt = SYSDATE, upd_dt = SYSDATE WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantID} AND insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND insd_device_id = #{deviceKey} AND auth_yn = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT /* DeviceMapper.isRegisteredUser, 사용자 ID 조회, 황정택/와이즈스톤, 2013-12-23 */ insd_usermbr_no AS userKey, insd_device_id AS deviceKey, rep_device_yn AS isPrimary, tenant_id AS tenantID, device_id AS deviceID, auth_yn AS isUsed FROM tb_us_usermbr_device WHERE tenant_id = #{commonRequest.tenantID} AND device_id = #{userMbrDevice.deviceID} ORDER BY auth_dt

SELECT /* DeviceMapper.isRegisteredKeyAndID, 휴대기기 Key 조회(userKey, deviceKey로 조회), 황정택/와이즈스톤, 2013-12-23 */ DISTINCT(l.nativeID) AS nativeID , l.deviceKey AS deviceKey , l.deviceID AS deviceID FROM ( SELECT a.mbr_id AS nativeID , b.insd_device_id AS deviceKey , b.device_id AS deviceID FROM tb_us_usermbr a LEFT JOIN tb_us_usermbr_device b ON a.insd_usermbr_no = b.insd_usermbr_no AND a.tenant_id = b.tenant_id WHERE a.tenant_id = #{tenantID} AND b.insd_device_id = #{deviceKey} AND b.auth_yn = 'Y' AND b.insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} ) l

SELECT /* DeviceMapper.isSubCodeChangeManagement, 서브상태가 변동처리대상인지 여부 확인, 황정택/와이즈스톤, 2014-03-11 */ insd_usermbr_no AS userKey, usermbr_no AS imMbrNo, mbr_id AS userID FROM tb_us_usermbr WHERE tenant_id = #{commonRequest.tenantID} AND insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND mbr_status_sub_cd = 'US010314' /* 변동처리대상 */
SELECT /* DeviceMapper.getUserSequence, 시퀀스 조회, 황정택/와이즈스톤, 2013-12-23 */ sq_us_usermbr_device.NEXTVAL AS nextval FROM DUAL
mapper.update: INSERT /* DeviceMapper.createDevice, 휴대기기 등록, 황정택/와이즈스톤, 2013-12-23 */ INTO tb_us_usermbr_device ( tenant_id, insd_usermbr_no, insd_device_id, device_id, device_model_cd, start_dt, upd_dt, reg_dt, auth_dt, auth_yn ,mno_cd ,device_alias ,rep_device_yn ,sms_recv_yn ,device_natv_id ,device_acct ,svc_mang_no ,entry_chnl_cd ,chg_case_cd ) VALUES ( #{tenantID}, #{userKey}, #{deviceKey}, #{deviceID}, #{deviceModelNo}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y' ,#{deviceTelecom} ,#{deviceNickName} ,#{isPrimary} ,#{isRecvSMS} ,#{nativeID} ,#{deviceAccount} ,#{svcMangNum} ,#{joinId} ,#{changeCaseCode} )

MERGE /* DeviceMapper.xml, updateDeviceDetail, SAC(SC), 김경복, 2015-05-27 */ INTO tb_us_usermbr_device_dtl l USING DUAL ON ( l.tenant_id = #{tenantID} AND l.insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND l.insd_device_id = #{deviceKey} AND l.device_mang_item_cd = #{extraProfile} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET l.reg_value = #{extraProfileValue},
l.upd_dt = to_date(#{updateDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),
l.upd_dt = SYSDATE,
l.system_id = #{systemID} , l.upd_id = #{regID}, l.reg_id = #{regID} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( tenant_id, insd_usermbr_no, insd_device_id, device_mang_item_cd, reg_value, reg_dt, system_id , reg_id, upd_id ) VALUES ( #{tenantID}, #{userKey}, #{deviceKey}, #{extraProfile}, #{extraProfileValue},
to_date(#{regDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),
SYSDATE,
#{systemID} , #{regID}, #{regID} )

INSERT /* DeviceMapper.insertUpdateDeviceHistory, device 변경 히스토리 추가, 황정택/와이즈스톤, 2014-01-15 */ INTO tb_us_usermbr_device_his ( seq, tenant_id, insd_usermbr_no, insd_device_id, start_dt, end_dt, device_id, device_model_cd, mno_cd, device_alias, rep_device_yn, auth_yn, auth_dt, upd_dt, sms_recv_yn, device_natv_id, device_acct, entry_chnl_cd, ins_dt, svc_mang_no, reg_dt, chg_case_cd ) SELECT sq_us_usermbr_device_his.NEXTVAL AS seq, tenant_id, insd_usermbr_no, insd_device_id, start_dt, SYSDATE, /* end_dt */ device_id, device_model_cd, mno_cd, device_alias, rep_device_yn, auth_yn, auth_dt, SYSDATE, /* upd_dt */ sms_recv_yn, device_natv_id, device_acct, entry_chnl_cd, SYSDATE, svc_mang_no, reg_dt, chg_case_cd FROM tb_us_usermbr_device WHERE insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND insd_device_id = #{deviceKey} AND tenant_id = #{tenantID}

INSERT /* DeviceMapper.insertUpdateDeviceHistoryCode, device 변경 히스토리 추가, 황정택/와이즈스톤, 2014-01-15 */ INTO tb_us_usermbr_device_his ( seq, tenant_id, insd_usermbr_no, insd_device_id, start_dt, end_dt, device_id, pre_device_id, device_model_cd, mno_cd, device_alias, rep_device_yn, auth_yn, auth_dt, upd_dt, sms_recv_yn, device_natv_id, device_acct, entry_chnl_cd, ins_dt, svc_mang_no, reg_dt, chg_case_cd ) SELECT sq_us_usermbr_device_his.NEXTVAL AS seq, tenant_id, insd_usermbr_no, insd_device_id, start_dt, SYSDATE, /* end_dt */ device_id, device_id, device_model_cd, mno_cd, device_alias, rep_device_yn, auth_yn, auth_dt, SYSDATE, /* upd_dt */ sms_recv_yn, device_natv_id, device_acct, entry_chnl_cd, SYSDATE, svc_mang_no, reg_dt, #{changeCaseCode} FROM tb_us_usermbr_device WHERE insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND insd_device_id = #{deviceKey} AND tenant_id = #{tenantID}
mapper.select: SELECT /* DeviceMapper.retrieveUserInfo, 사용자 정보 조회, 황정택/와이즈스톤, 2013-12-23 */ tenant_id tenantID, insd_usermbr_no userKey, usermbr_no imMbrNo, intg_svc_no imSvcNo, mbr_clas_cd userType, mbr_status_main_cd userMainStatus, mbr_status_sub_cd userSubStatus, login_status_cd loginStatusCode, ofauth_stop_status_cd stopStatusCode, device_reg_cnt deviceCount, mbr_id userID FROM tb_us_usermbr WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantID} AND insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND mbr_status_main_cd != 'US010202'

SELECT /* DeviceMapper.findMainDevice, 대표기기 조회, 황정택/와이즈스톤, 2013-12-23 */ tenant_id AS tenantID, insd_device_id AS deviceKey, device_id AS deviceID, insd_usermbr_no AS userKey FROM tb_us_usermbr_device WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantID} AND rep_device_yn = 'Y' AND auth_yn = 'Y' AND insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE /* DeviceMapper.removeOwner, 사용자 탈퇴, 황정택/와이즈스톤, 2013-12-23 */ tb_us_usermbr SET bolter_case_cd = #{secedeTypeCode}, mbr_status_main_cd = #{userMainStatus}, mbr_status_sub_cd = #{userSubStatus}, bolter_day = #{secedeDate}, start_dt = SYSDATE, end_dt = SYSDATE, device_reg_cnt = 0, /* 휴대기기 보유 카운트 초기화 */ upd_dt = SYSDATE WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantID} AND insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey}
mapper.select: SELECT /* DeviceMapper.checkSaveNSync, savensync 조회,wisestone_mikepark, 2014-03-10 */ insd_device_id AS deviceKey, device_id AS deviceID, pre_device_id AS preDeviceID, insd_usermbr_no AS userKey, chg_case_cd AS code, upd_dt, mbr_status_main_cd AS isActive, mbr_status_sub_cd AS userSubStatus, usermbr_no AS imMbrNo FROM (SELECT t1.insd_device_id, t1.device_id, t1.pre_device_id, t1.insd_usermbr_no, t1.chg_case_cd, t1.upd_dt, t2.mbr_status_main_cd, t2.mbr_status_sub_cd, t2.usermbr_no FROM tb_us_usermbr_device_his t1 JOIN tb_us_usermbr t2 ON t1.tenant_id = t2.tenant_id AND t1.insd_usermbr_no=t2.insd_usermbr_no WHERE t1.tenant_id=#{commonRequest.tenantID} AND t1.pre_device_id = #{deviceID} AND t1.auth_yn = 'Y' AND t1.upd_dt > (SYSDATE-15) AND t1.chg_case_cd in ('US012003', 'US012012') AND t2.mbr_clas_cd = 'US011501' ORDER BY t1.upd_dt DESC ) l WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT /* DeviceMapper.checkRealSaveNSync, savensync 조회,wisestone_mikepark, 2014-03-10 */ deviceKey, deviceID, preDeviceID, userKey, changeCaseCode, svcMangNo, upd_dt, isActive, userSubStatus, imMbrNo FROM ( SELECT t1.insd_device_id AS deviceKey, t1.device_id AS deviceID, t1.pre_device_id AS preDeviceID, t1.insd_usermbr_no AS userKey, t1.chg_case_cd AS changeCaseCode, t1.svc_mang_no AS svcMangNo, t1.upd_dt, t2.mbr_status_main_cd AS isActive, t2.mbr_status_sub_cd AS userSubStatus, t2.usermbr_no AS imMbrNo FROM spmbr.tb_us_usermbr_device_his t1 JOIN spmbr.tb_us_usermbr t2 ON t1.tenant_id = t2.tenant_id AND t1.insd_usermbr_no=t2.insd_usermbr_no WHERE 1=1 AND t1.tenant_id = #{commonRequest.tenantID} AND t1.pre_device_id = #{deviceID} AND t1.upd_dt > (SYSDATE-15) AND t2.mbr_clas_cd = 'US011501' ORDER BY UPD_DT DESC ) L WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT /* DeviceMapper.searchDeviceOwner, 휴대기기의 소유자이력을 조회, wisestone_mikepark, 2014-06-24 */ userKey AS userKey, deviceKey AS deviceKey, auth_dt AS authenticationDate, isUsed AS isUsed, srcName AS tableName FROM ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT insd_usermbr_no AS userKey, insd_device_id AS deviceKey, auth_dt AS auth_dt, AUTH_YN AS isUsed, 'TB_US_USERMBR_DEVICE' AS srcName, start_dt FROM tb_us_usermbr_device WHERE tenant_id = #{commonRequest.tenantID} AND device_id = #{deviceID} AND TO_DATE (#{regDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN start_dt AND end_dt
UNION ALL SELECT insd_usermbr_no AS userKey, insd_device_id AS deviceKey, auth_dt AS auth_dt, AUTH_YN AS isUsed, 'TB_US_USERMBR_DEVICE' AS srcName, start_dt FROM tb_us_usermbr_device_his WHERE tenant_id = #{commonRequest.tenantID} AND device_id = #{deviceID} AND TO_DATE (#{regDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN start_dt AND end_dt
UNION ALL SELECT insd_usermbr_no AS userKey, insd_device_id AS deviceKey, auth_dt AS auth_dt, AUTH_YN AS isUsed, 'TB_US_USERMBR_DEVICE_WD' AS srcName, start_dt FROM tb_us_usermbr_device_wd WHERE tenant_id = #{commonRequest.tenantID} AND device_id = #{deviceID} AND TO_DATE (#{regDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN start_dt AND end_dt) ORDER BY DECODE (isUsed, 'Y', '1', '2'), start_dt DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT /* DeviceMapper.searchDeviceOwnerHis, 휴대기기의 소유자이력을 조회, wisestone_mikepark, 2014-06-24 */ userKey AS userKey, deviceKey AS deviceKey, auth_dt AS authenticationDate FROM ( SELECT insd_usermbr_no AS userKey, insd_device_id AS deviceKey, TO_CHAR( auth_dt,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS auth_dt FROM tb_us_usermbr_device_his WHERE tenant_id = #{commonRequest.tenantID} AND device_id = #{deviceID} AND auth_yn = 'Y' AND start_dt <= TO_DATE(#{regDate},'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND end_dt >= TO_DATE(#{regDate},'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY auth_dt DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT /* DeviceMapper.searchOrderDevice, 등록 단말 정보 조회, burkhan_rejoice, 2014-10-02 */ deviceId, deviceTelecom, authYn, tableName, tenantID FROM (SELECT device_id AS deviceId, mno_cd AS deviceTelecom, auth_yn AS authYn, 'TB_US_USERMBR_DEVICE' AS tableName, tenant_id AS tenantID FROM tb_us_usermbr_device WHERE tenant_id = #{commonRequest.tenantID} AND insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND insd_device_id = #{deviceKey} UNION ALL SELECT device_id AS deviceId, mno_cd AS deviceTelecom, auth_yn AS authYn, 'TB_US_USERMBR_DEVICE_WD' AS srcName, tenant_id AS tenantID FROM tb_us_usermbr_device_wd WHERE tenant_id = #{commonRequest.tenantID} AND insd_usermbr_no = #{userKey} AND insd_device_id = #{deviceKey} )
